entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Rain mixed with light snow early this morning. Wind south 30 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
